Original race locations

  • Aasimar/Tieflings: Deity/Human hybrids; born whenever, wherever
  • Dragonborn: Dragon/Human hybrids; born whenever, wherever
  • Dwarves: Istovia
  • Elves: Qurea
    • Dark Elves: Descended from the elves tasked with protecting the Bloodwell, who gradually bent to its influence
    • Light Elves: Descended from the elves tasked with protecting the Wellspring, who gradually bent to its influence
  • Gnomes: Hartland
  • Halflings: Evedale
  • Humans: Wrakarr
  • Orcs: Kharsh

Misc

  • orcs/half-orcs highly value orcish artifacts, as they're rare on aidilon
